author: ceki
msg: - In the o.a.l.db package added  support for a connection source to be
- Modified NestedComponentIA to support the configuration of multiply
nested components. The previous version could only support just one
- FullCycleDBTest is now tested with both MySQL and PostgreSQL.
- Removed the isInError variable from the Action class.

author: ceki
msg: MySQL properties are local machine dependent

author: psmith
msg: updated with the Java Web Start link... Be nice to have a nice image button
but can't find anything that has an explicit licence grant to use it at will,
so defering to simple text link for now.

author: psmith
msg: Tidied up the Hidden logger panel area of the Logger tree panel.  It's now in a popup dialog,
but you can see a summary of how many hidden loggers you have at the bottom of the Logger

author: psmith
msg: made sure an appropriate set of JavaDoc is bundled in with the chainsaw jar, and updated the release notes
New signed version has been uploaded to the webstart area.
